code: import React from"react";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const IconLink=_ref=>{let{url,icon,text,className}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:className,style:{marginLeft:"1rem"},href:url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:text})]});};export default IconLink;
